problem_text_cn: 如图,光源P在水平放置的横杆AB的正上方,AB在灯光下的影子CD也呈水平状态,AB=2m,CD=6m,点P到CD的距离是3.9m,则AB与CD之间的距离是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the light source P is directly above the horizontally placed crossbar AB, and the shadow CD of AB under the light is also horizontal, AB = N_0, CD = N_1, the distance between point P and CD is N_2, then the distance between AB and CD is ()
